Body:
self.assertEqual(enums.Tags.OBJECT_TYPE, enums.
    convert_attribute_name_to_tag('Object Type'))
args = enums.Tags.COMMON_ATTRIBUTES,
self.assertRaisesRegex(ValueError, 'The attribute name must be a string.',
    enums.convert_attribute_name_to_tag, *args)
args = 'invalid',
self.assertRaisesRegex(ValueError, "Unrecognized attribute name: 'invalid'"
    .format(args[0]), enums.convert_attribute_name_to_tag, *args)
